title: On the compactness of the Weyl operator in $\mathcal{S}_{\omega}$
authors: Vicente Asensio, Chiara Boiti, David Jornet, Alessandro Oliaro
abstract:
We characterize, using time-frequency analysis, the continuity and
compactness of the Weyl operator in global classes of ultradifferentiable
functions $\mathcal{S}_\omega$, for weight functions $\omega$ in the sense of
Braun, Meise and Taylor. As a consequence, we give results about the
compactness of the localization operator in $\mathcal{S}_\omega$, in relation
with the spaces of $\omega$-multipliers and $\omega$-convolutors of
$\mathcal{S}_\omega$. Moreover, we provide several examples that complement our
investigation.
